name: Love Week
description:
A game based on valentine week days made for the Major Jam 2.

Theme:- Love

Limitation:- All textures must fit within one 128x128 image.

Its a local multiplayer game with two players on the same keyboard.

Tip:- Try to play this multiplayer instead of single player, it would be fun to play with.

Art Link:- https://lospec.com/i/djh8

Controls:- 

Player 1:-

1-Shoot

W-Jump

A/D-Left/Right

Player 2:-

0-Defend

I-Jump

J/L-Left/Right

Music Credits:-

"8 Bit Love!" Happy Fun Game Music by HeatleyBros

Song link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8_5m4Q4rL1Q 

Free Music For Your Youtube Video https://www.youtube.com/user/HeatleyBros
